meanings.definition: To make a dent in something.
meanings.sent1: She was denting the car door when she accidentally hit it with a hammer.
meanings.sent2: The hailstorm was denting the roof of the house.
meanings.sent3: The toddler was denting the playdough with his tiny fingers.
meanings.sent4: His harsh words were denting her self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The constant rain was denting the soil, causing erosion.

meanings.definition: The act of causing a dent in something.
meanings.sent1: The denting on the car hood was a result of the hailstorm.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the denting on the metal surface and wondered how it happened.
meanings.sent3: The denting on the cake made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The denting on the basketball showed how many times it had been used.
meanings.sent5: The denting on the tree trunk indicated the woodpecker's presence.
